settings.heading: Shipping
settings.row_content:
You have the option to select ground, second-day or overnight delivery. 
STANDARD DOMESTIC SHIPPING
Items that we have in stock will ship within 1 to 5 business days. 
DAMAGED MERCHANDISE
Please inspect your order upon arrival and contact us immediately if the item(s) is damaged, defective or incorrect.

In order to process a damage claim, please provide photos of the damaged item(s) and original packaging. Please call (305) 933-5579 or email bweiser@lakeviewhomeaccessories.com to process the damage claim. Once your damage claim is approved, we will send you a return shipping label and return authorization information.

In the event that you receive damaged merchandise, we will make arrangements with the carrier for the pick-up of the damaged merchandise and delivery of its replacement.

Please do not discard the shipping box the merchandise was shipped in or its packing materials. The carrier will want to inspect them.

OUR RETURN POLICY
Please Note, returns will be accepted within 14 days of receipt for Store Credit or Exchange only. All shipping fees are non-refundable. 

We do not accept returns or exchanges on special orders or customized items. These items are non-returnable, and non-refundable.  All returns must be pre-approved. To initiate a return authorization please call us at (305) 933- 5579 or email us a bweiser@lakeviewhomeaccessories.com

Once a return is processed and accepted by Lakeview Home Accessories you will receive the value of your return in the form of a gift card that is redeemable both in store and online in the form of a receipt.

settings.heading: To The Trade
settings.row_content: Lakeview Home Accessories is here to assist in benefitting your clients needs. Please emails us at bweiser@lakeviewhomeaccessories.com regarding  a trade discount..
